alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Converse County Lower Elevations; North Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 03 at 2:29AM MDT until November 04 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches for the north Laramie Range. * WHERE...Converse County Lower Elevations, North Laramie Range and Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County. * WHEN...From 4 AM Thursday to 6 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions from snow and black ice. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Converse County Lower Elevations; North Laramie Range
